amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to require covered employers to email their organization's workplace violence prevention plan to the organization's staff, following completion of annual training.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to require covered employers to email their organization's workplace violence prevention plan to the organization's staff, following completion of annual training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hastings.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
